attributes.action: Tax fuel companies who annouce massive profits while the consumers suffer great financial loss
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the government should tax companies such as BP who today (28.10.08) announced a steep increase in profits for the last 3 months.   We the consumer are breaking ourselves financially at the moment due to the worlds economic crisis and these companies should now start to give back.

We need lower fuel costs, both vehicle fuels and housing fuels - enough money is made from the consumer already!

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence:

http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/oilsnotwell/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
